item.title: Some help with javac error
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

ok this is what i have in my compiler

@echo off
COLOR 08
title bmxscape Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java” server
pause

and this is what i have in my runserver

@echo off
title bmxscape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

try thoughs and see if they work feel free to post if it was helpful

Read full topic
